name: Monstrous
effect_text: Enemy models in LoS of the leader must take a Horror test at the start of the Leader’s activation. Fails produce a −1 Horror token. The leader may gain 1 Horror to force one additional Horror test on a model within 1 M.

name: Sorcerer
effect_text:
Your leader can purchase two Psychic 
Powers costing 1 for free 
Recasting the same Psychic Power in a 
round costs 1 Command Point.

name: Executioner
effect_text: Once per round, at the end of the Leader’s activation, they may make a free Fight or Shoot action. This attack ignores penalties for range or engagement once per round.

name:
Unrelenting 
Advance
effect_text: Once per round, at the end of the Leader’s activation, up to 2 Allies in LoS may make a free Move action. These moves cannot end in Engagement and cannot be Charges. If the move brings them within 1 M of an enemy, the move may trigger a free Horror test.

name: Condemn
effect_text:
Use 1 action to Mark an Enemy until the end 
of the round. At the end of the Leader’s
 activation, up to 2 Allies in LoS of the marked 
enemy may make a free Fight or Shoot action 
against it. Each ally may only make one attack 
this way per round with +1 AP.

name: Kill Order
effect_text:
Once per round, when the Leader takes an 
enemy Out of Action, one ally in LoS may 
immediately take a free Shoot or Fight action.

name:
Relentless 
Commander
effect_text:
The Leader may gain 1 Horror to remove
 Exhausted and act again (max once per
 round).

name: Priority Target
effect_text:
Once per round, choose one enemy model.
Allies gain +1 to hit against that model
 until the end of the round.

name:
Bodyguard 
Protocol
effect_text: When an ally within 1 Move is hit, the Leader may take the hit instead. If the leader takes the hit, the attacking model gains 1 Horror token.

name: Mind Leash
effect_text: Once per round, when an enemy fails a Horror test in LoS, the Leader may force that model to Move 1. If it moves adjacent to another ally, it takes 1 damage.
